resources.string: This app is basically displays the cities based on given longitude and latitude. How to use this app? On the first screen you can see two input boxes there you have to put valid longitude and latitude. After that press-> Done button to see the cities that are around that longitude and latitude. All the cities will display on the next screen, if you want to see details about any city, you can simply click on that city where you can see Region, Currency of that city and specific longitude and latitude of that city. To see that city on google maps click-> Go To Google Maps button. You can add any city to your favorite list by clicking on Add to Favorite button. To remove any city from your favorite list you can click on Remove From favorites button or you can visit Favorite city list and then remove from there.
How much money do you want to donate?
This is the City Finder activity, written by Kiranpreet Kaur
